That is supposed to mean?.. Oh and it wasn't always like this, it just started acting up.

Is it possible to use the same guns that are used in the TTT server?  Or is there a reason we went with these guns we have now?  Also, Jail is being severely mistreated right now.  So much has been broken for so long.

>> Is it possible to use the same guns that are used in the TTT server?  Or is there a reason we went with these guns we have now?  Also, Jail is being severely mistreated right now.  So much has been broken for so long. 
I agree. The first weapons we used bird got rid of, and replaced with the shitty ones it's using right now :/
Bird said that we switched because they were too weak, but I'll take that over unusable.
I did in fact leave the old weapons in the add-ons folder, so I suppose if we're going to switch back to those, it shouldn't take much...

>> we switched because they were too weak 

Couldn't you just edit the lua in the gun(s) that're underpowered to up the damage?  If so, then great!  Either way I can't wait to
get back on the server after the switch :D

I hate to be such a bother to bump this, but I thought this would be a great idea. I have heard complaints about guns lagging many of the players. Will this ever be implemented, or is it a lost cuase?
